abstract.text: A type the system uses to access a parameter or property value.

from system experiences like Siri and the Shortcuts app.

Returns a
error with context for the user to disambiguate amongst an array
of values from for this parameter and re-perform the intent with the new value.
Returns a
error with context to request a value from the user for this
parameter and re-perform the intent with the new value.
Request that the user confirm the parameter value.
Use
when you need to the ask user to confirm the parameter value.
Use
when you need to the ask user to confirm the parameter value.
Request that the user disambiguate amongst an array of values for this parameter.
Request a value from the user for this parameter.
Check if an IntentParameter was provided an initial value
A type that provides information about an associated parameter during value resolution.
A property wrapper that represents an app intent dependency you use to provide dynamic options.
A type whose values can be implicitly or explicitly copied.
A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
